user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.<COMPLETION_START>People who are overweight are more likely to have health problems.
Some races are more likely to commit crimes than others.
Women tend to be more emotional than men.
Climate change is caused by human activity.
The death penalty does not lower crime rates.
The average lifespan of a pit bull is shorter than other breeds.
Vaccines do not cause autism.
The United States has a higher rate of gun violence than other developed countries.
Air pollution causes lung cancer.
Child abuse is more common in low-income households.
Homosexuality is not a choice, but rather a part of a person's identity.
The world's oceans are becoming more acidic due to carbon emissions.
Some people are born with higher intelligence than others.
Abstinence-only sex education does not prevent teen pregnancies.
The gender pay gap still exists in many industries.
The majority of people who win the lottery end up bankrupt within a few years.
Fast food is not a healthy dietary choice.<COMPLETION_END>
